entries.a_lookingfordisk: Target down.  Checking for the disk.
entries.a_hasdisk: The disk is here.  Mission complete.
entries.a_nodisk: There's no disk here.  Command must have had the target wrong.
entries.m_desperatehelpme: I don't know where to go.  If they find me I'm dead.  You have to help me!
entries.m_theycome: Oh no, its too late!  Take it, run, go! GO!
entries.r_m_greet_who: Who are you? What is this? What must I do with it?
entries.m_greet: They're after me.  Take this, please!
entries.m_pleasehelpme: You must help me.  They'll find me soon.  Please help me...please...
